name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability in the web server to execute a malicious script, attempting to create a reverse shell.

action--a4d5df5d-bfd6-4435-a4b8-a9c614b7.name: Terminate malicious process
action--a4d5df5d-bfd6-4435-a4b8-a9c614b7.description: Terminate the malicious script if it is running.

action--f42b9d3d-7f37-4b3a-8c1e-63c9632e.name: Block outbound connections from suspected host
action--f42b9d3d-7f37-4b3a-8c1e-63c9632e.description: Prevent any outbound connections to the suspected malicious domain.

parallel--561eea92-21bb-485e-8e29-1249fe.name: Post-Malicious Process Mitigation
parallel--561eea92-21bb-485e-8e29-1249fe.description: Conduct further mitigation actions in parallel.

action--d3c6b4a1-e39e-4f2f-b745-0fcf2439.name: Conduct a scan of the host
action--d3c6b4a1-e39e-4f2f-b745-0fcf2439.description: Scan the host for malware and remove detected threats.

action--eccf0430-4a3d-44ba-94c7-6b92b41d.name: Evaluate server logs for redundancy
action--eccf0430-4a3d-44ba-94c7-6b92b41d.description: Check for any relevant logs that might give insight into the incidents.

action--ea82a7a8-8d2f-4d9d-a6f5-f3f3a709.name: Restore backup and patch vulnerability
action--ea82a7a8-8d2f-4d9d-a6f5-f3f3a709.description: Restore the web server from a backup and apply the necessary patches.
